modules.title: 1. Statistics Fundamentals
modules.description: Master statistical concepts and techniques essential for data analysis, including descriptive and inferential statistics, probability distributions, and hypothesis testing.

chapters.title: Introduction to Statistics & Data Types
chapters.description: Introduction to Statistics, Types of Data (Qualitative and Quantitative), Overview of Descriptive and Inferential Statistics. Part 1 of complete statistics course covering all essential concepts needed for data analysis.

chapters.title: Sampling, Measures of Central Tendency & Dispersion
chapters.description: Sampling Techniques (Population vs Sample, Probability and Non-Probability Sampling), Measures of Central Tendency (Mean, Median, Mode), Measures of Dispersion (Range, Variance, Standard Deviation, Mean Deviation).

chapters.title: Probability & Probability Distributions
chapters.description: Probability concepts (Addition Rule, Independent Events, Conditional Probability, Bayes' Theorem), Probability Distributions (Uniform, Binomial, Poisson, Normal Distributions), Skewness, Kurtosis, Z-Score calculations.

modules.title: 2. Excel & Advanced Excel (MIS)
modules.description: Master Excel from basics to advanced features including pivot tables, dashboards, and data visualization. Essential tool for data analytics and reporting.

chapters.title: Excel Basics & Functions
chapters.description: Master fundamental operations with functions like SUM, MIN, MAX, COUNT, IF, SUMIF, VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, XLOOKUP, FILTER, INDEX, MATCH, conditional formatting, and creating various chart types (Bar, Column, Pie, Waterfall, Waffle charts). Advanced number formatting and date handling.

chapters.title: MIS (Management Information System) - Pivot Tables & Dashboards
chapters.description: Pivot table creation, advanced pivot charts, Slicers and Timelines, Field List management, Grouping and Sorting, drill-down functionality, creating interactive MIS/Excel dashboards using multiple datasets.

chapters.title: Excel with ChatGPT - Advanced Formula Generation
chapters.description: Leveraging ChatGPT to generate and debug complex Excel formulas, data cleaning, transformation tasks, automation tips, and best practices for structuring datasets.

chapters.title: Excel Projects - End to End
chapters.description: HR Analysis Dashboard, Road Accident Analysis, Blinkit Sales Analysis projects. Real-world applications covering Ecommerce, Hotel Management, Sales, and Food Supply domains.

modules.title: 3. Data Warehousing Concepts
modules.description: Understand data warehouse architecture, ETL processes, OLAP/OLTP, dimensional modeling, and schema design for efficient data storage and analysis.

chapters.title: DW Architecture & Concepts
chapters.description: DW Architecture, Need of DW, Data Mart, ETL Process, OLAP vs OLTP, Dimensional Modelling, Granularity and Cardinality, Facts, Attributes and Dimensions.

chapters.title: Schemas & Advanced DW Concepts
chapters.description: Slow Changing Dimension (SCD), Normalization vs Denormalization, Schema types - Star Schema, Snowflake Schema, Galaxy Schema, and their use cases.

modules.title: 4. SQL - Structured Query Language
modules.description: Master SQL for querying, data manipulation, and complex database operations across multiple DBMS platforms (MS SQL, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL).

chapters.title: SQL Fundamentals - DQL & DML
chapters.description: Introduction to SQL and RDBMS, DQL (SELECT, WHERE, GROUP BY, ORDER BY, HAVING, DISTINCT, LIMIT), DML (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE), Operators (Arithmetic, Comparison, Logical, String), Basic SQL Functions and Queries.

chapters.title: SQL Advanced Topics - Window Functions & CTEs
chapters.description: DDL (CREATE, DROP, ALTER), DCL (GRANT, REVOKE), TCL (COMMIT, ROLLBACK), Window Functions (RANK, DENSE_RANK, ROW_NUMBER, LEAD, LAG), CTEs, Stored Procedures, Indexing, Views, and Recursive Queries.

chapters.title: Joins, Subqueries & Aggregate Functions
chapters.description: Inner Join, Left Join, Right Join, Outer Join, Self Join, Cross Join, Correlated and Nested Subqueries, Aggregate Functions (SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX, COUNT), Date/String/Numeric Functions.

chapters.title: SQL Projects - Real World Applications
chapters.description: Bank Loan Analysis, Coffee Sales Analysis, India Elections Results Analysis. Complex multi-table queries and business logic implementation.

modules.title: 5. Power BI - Business Intelligence & Visualization
modules.description: Create interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI Desktop and Service. Master data modeling, DAX expressions, and real-time visualization.

chapters.title: Power BI Desktop - Introduction & UI
chapters.description: Introduction to Power BI, advantages and scalable options, Power BI Designer elements, Report Views, Canvas, Visualizations, Import Data Options, Properties and Grid Settings.

chapters.title: Data Visualization & Charts in Power BI
chapters.description: Stacked/Clustered Bar/Column charts, Line & Area charts, Waterfall & Scatter charts, Pie charts, Map Reports, Conditional Formatting, Field Properties configuration, Analytics options.

chapters.title: Power BI Data Modeling & Relationships
chapters.description: Connecting multiple tables, Relationship types and importance, Create relationships manually, Enable/Disable auto-relationships, Cross database relationships, Active/Inactive relationships.

chapters.title: Power Query & Data Cleaning
chapters.description: Power Query Editor Interface, Data cleaning, Merge & Append tables, Data source settings, Transform data (Replace values, Split columns, Format columns), Conditional & Custom columns, M Query basics.

chapters.title: DAX Expressions - Basic to Advanced
chapters.description: Data Analysis Expressions fundamentals, DAX Context (Row & Filter Context), Calculated Columns and Measures, DAX Functions (Aggregate, Filter, Date/Time, Logical, Text), Time Intelligence functions (YTD, QTD, MTD), TOPN, RANKX, advanced calculations.

chapters.title: Power BI Projects - Intermediate to Advanced
chapters.description: Blinkit Analysis, Electric Vehicle Analysis, Car Sales Analysis, Call Centre Analysis, Coffee Sales (SQL+PowerBI), Bank Loan Analysis (SQL+PowerBI), Hospital ER Analysis, Pizza Sales (SQL+PowerBI), IPL Analysis. 5-6 comprehensive projects with complete logic and domain knowledge.

chapters.title: Power BI Service & Deployment
chapters.description: Introduction to Power BI Service (cloud platform), Deployment of Reports and Dashboards, Workspace Management, Data Import and Refresh Scheduling, Row-Level Security (RLS), Collaboration features, Alerts and Notifications, Mobile App usage.

modules.title: 6. Tableau - Advanced Data Visualization
modules.description: Master Tableau for creating stunning interactive dashboards with advanced calculations, LOD expressions, and enterprise deployment.

chapters.title: Tableau Interface & Data Connections
chapters.description: Tableau architecture and features, Installation and interface overview, Connect to various data sources (Excel, CSV, PDF, MS SQL Server, Spatial Files), Data visualization using Show Me feature, Workbook and Worksheet creation, Calculated fields.

chapters.title: Data Visualization & Chart Types in Tableau
chapters.description: Bar, Stacked Bar, Combo, Line, Area, Blended Axis, Dual Axis, Lollipop, Pie, Donut, Histogram, Map, Pareto, Waterfall, Gantt, Dumbbell, Sparklines, Box Plots, Tiled and Hexagonal Maps, Animated Graphs.

chapters.title: Advanced Data Preparation & Joins
chapters.description: Live vs Extract connections, Pivoting and splitting data, Data Interpreter for cleaning unstructured data, Join types (Inner, Left, Right, Outer), Complex Joins, Referential Integrity, Union, Data Blending, Cross DB Join, Custom SQL queries, TWB vs TWBX formats.

chapters.title: Filters & Advanced Calculations (LOD)
chapters.description: Filter types (Dimension, Measure, Condition-based), Action filters, Global filters, Wild card filtering, Top & Bottom N filters, Date Functions, String Functions, Logical Functions, Aggregate Functions, Table Calculations, LOD expressions (Fixed, Include, Exclude), Window Functions, Dynamic Parameters.

chapters.title: Grouping, Hierarchies & Dashboard Creation
chapters.description: Groups and Sets, Conditional sets for Top/Bottom, Hierarchies and Bins, Dashboard creation with Floating and Tiled Objects, Dashboard Actions, Container Layouting, Story making for data narrative.

chapters.title: Tableau Projects - Beginner to Advanced
chapters.description: Car Sales Analysis, Electric Vehicle Analysis, Road Accident Analysis, HR Analysis, Pizza Sales (SQL+Tableau), Bank Loan Analysis (SQL+Tableau), Sales Analysis projects. 5-6 comprehensive projects covering all Tableau functionalities and advanced LOD calculations.

chapters.title: Tableau Server - Enterprise Deployment
chapters.description: Installation of Tableau Online/Cloud, Publishing Dashboards, User Management, Permission Settings, Roles on server, Extract refresh scheduling, Site status Dashboard, Row-level security (RLS), Alerts and subscriptions.

modules.title: 7. Python for Data Analysis
modules.description: Learn Python programming with focus on data analysis libraries including NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn. Perform EDA and build analytical projects.

chapters.title: Python Basics & Jupyter Notebooks
chapters.description: What is Python and its role in data analysis, Jupyter Notebooks installation and setup, The Jupyter interface, Comments and Markdown, Print function and Function help.

chapters.title: NumPy - Numerical Computing Fundamentals
chapters.description: Introduction to NumPy, NumPy Arrays creation and manipulation, Indexing and Selection, NumPy Operations (arithmetic, statistical, logical), Array broadcasting and reshaping.

chapters.title: Pandas - Data Manipulation & Analysis
chapters.description: Series and DataFrames creation and operations, Conditional Filtering, Useful Methods (Apply, Statistical Information, Sorting), Missing Data handling, Group By operations, Combining DataFrames, Text methods for strings, Time methods for dates, Input/Output operations (CSV, Excel, SQL).

chapters.title: Data Visualization - Matplotlib & Seaborn
chapters.description: Matplotlib basics and Figure Objects, Implementing Figures and Axes, Subplots Functionality, Legends, Colors and Styles. Seaborn introduction, Scatterplots, Distribution Plots, Categorical Plots, Comparison Plots, Grid Plots, Matrix Plots.

chapters.title: Python Projects - EDA & Data Analysis
chapters.description: Hotel Bookings Analysis, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) from scratch. Application of Python concepts to real-world projects including data cleaning, preprocessing, analysis, and visualization.

modules.title: 8. Projects & Portfolio Building
modules.description: Create independent projects showcasing your skills across all tools (SQL, Excel, Power BI, Tableau, Python) and build a comprehensive portfolio website.

chapters.title: Unguided Projects & Portfolio Development
chapters.description: Build independent projects using provided datasets covering multiple domains (Ecommerce, Healthcare, Finance, HR, Retail). Create a portfolio website to showcase your projects, problem-solving approach, and analytical thinking. Demonstrate proficiency in all learned tools with real-world problem solving.

modules.title: 9. JIRA & Agile Methodologies
modules.description: Learn JIRA for project management and Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban) essential for collaborative data analytics projects.

chapters.title: JIRA Tool & Agile Basics
chapters.description: Introduction to JIRA, User Interface and Navigation, Issue Tracking and Management, Project Configuration, Agile Methodologies (Scrum and Kanban), Difference between Agile and Waterfall, Tracking progress with Agile boards and reports. SCRUM Foundation Certification preparation.

modules.title: 10. Soft Skills Development
modules.description: Develop essential professional soft skills including communication, data storytelling, critical thinking, and collaboration required for successful data analysts.

chapters.title: Communication & Data Storytelling
chapters.description: Communication skills (Verbal, Written, Presentation), Data Storytelling techniques for conveying insights to non-technical stakeholders, Attention to detail, Curiosity and Learning Mindset, Adaptability in team environments.

chapters.title: Collaboration & Professional Development
chapters.description: Cross-team collaboration, Problem-solving strategies, Time management for data projects, Building strong professional relationships, Continuous learning mindset in rapidly evolving tech landscape.

modules.title: 11. Resume, LinkedIn, Portfolio & Interview Preparation
modules.description: Create a professional presence through ATS-friendly resume, optimized LinkedIn profile, impressive portfolio website, and ace data analytics interviews.

chapters.title: Resume & Job Platform Optimization
chapters.description: Crafting ATS-friendly resume, Naukri profile optimization, Resume best practices for data analyst roles, Highlighting technical skills and achievements, Domain knowledge demonstration.

chapters.title: LinkedIn Optimization & Professional Branding
chapters.description: LinkedIn profile optimization, Networking with professionals and recruiters, Displaying certifications and endorsements, Building professional credibility, Connecting with hiring managers.

chapters.title: Portfolio Website & Case Studies
chapters.description: Building a portfolio website showcasing projects, Creating compelling case studies with problem statements and solutions, Interactive visualizations and dashboards in portfolio, Demonstrating technical expertise and problem-solving approach.

chapters.title: Interview Preparation & Mock Interviews
chapters.description: Technical concept revision, Scenario-based interview questions preparation, Behavioral interview tips, Mock interview sessions with expert mentors, Common data analyst interview questions, Salary negotiation tips.
